page.title: 09 Garage services in Keith
page.content: There are five main garages in Keith. The Keith Garage holds an agency for the sale of Toyota cars which are made in Japan.The garage also services and repairs motor vehicles in a workshop. At the end of Moss Street,the G.T.Tyres garage runs a tyre sales service and supplies farmers with agricultural chemicals for spraying crops.It also sells petrol and has a repair workshop. The Central Garage in Keith is owned by W.Watson Smith who is the local bus operator but also runs a petrol station.In Fife-Keith there are two garages.The larger of these is Mutches Garage which services all types of vehicle as well as supplying petrol and accessories.Farther along Regent Street are the smaller premises of Duncan George who only carries out servicing and repair work.In Land Street the Auto -Body Centre carries out crash repairs.
